description: NTS Map: 082J15This can be a loop walk, via Rainy Creek and along the Elbow river. It's hike #313 Gillaen Daffern's book "Kananaskis Country Trail Guide".It's a relative level walk (approximately 200 meters elevation), with some view points including in Rainy pass along the highway.
directions: We did this in both directions I'd recommend going counterclockwise. Starting from pullout 300m West of Beaverflat campground. Hop over the guard rail and go to metal post, descend to T junction. I'd recommend turning right and following the Rainy Creek trail. Going the other direction we couldn't find the correct start of the Rainy Creek trail below Rainy pass
title: Beaver Flats to Cobble Flats
